header.title: About Me
header.subtitle: A short story about my background, experience and passions.

about.heading: Hello World!
about.content:
I'm Sebastián Soraire, Systems Analyst, future Systems Engineer and React Frontend Developer (Semi-Senior). Beyond the titles, I'm deeply curious and passionate about technology and how it can improve people's lives using Engineering.
I've been working in IT for more than six years. Since I was a kid, I loved building things; today I find in development and engineering that same creative spirit, amplified by the ability to generate real impact.
For the last three years I’ve been part of an Argentinian fintech, where I grew both technically and personally. My leaders have highlighted my empathy, commitment and proactivity, values I bring to every project.
I'm currently finishing my Systems Engineering degree and strengthening my stack with Node.js and Next.js. I’m also improving my English in pursuit of excellence.
I’m passionate about designing complete solutions: from understanding the problem and proposing the right architecture, to implementing, testing, and iterating under agile methodologies (SCRUM) with user feedback.
In recent years, I’ve worked on my soft skills – leadership, communication and teamwork. Learned about neuroscience and psychology, that helped me understand how emotions, awareness and empathy enhance collective performance.
Today I seek new challenges where I can merge my two main drives: technology and the human factor.

details: Implemented the debit card management module, automating activation and operations directly from the app, improving user experience.
Contributed to the full redesign of the company’s web and mobile wallet, modernizing legacy code and applying best practices in React Native and React JS.

These improvements and technical debt refactors significantly enhanced user experience, making the applications faster, smoother, more stable, and visually engaging, with fewer errors and a clearer, more intuitive navigation.

Worked closely with the UX Design team using Figma to implement interface and experience improvements, and collaborated with backend developers through code reviews and pull request validation to ensure code quality and consistency.
Collaborated with the team to develop solutions for the Security and Compliance department, automating processes and reducing review and approval times by 40%.
Leveraged AI to automate repetitive coding tasks, cutting development time by half and increasing efficiency and product quality.
Promoted a collaborative and empathetic work environment, encouraging open communication, cooperation, and continuous improvement within the team.
Built a QR code generation and scanning system for package tracking, reducing management times by 70% and eliminating manual errors.
Developed a platform using Google Maps API to monitor routes and deliveries in real time, improving timing and optimization of shipments and tracking.
Implemented a staff attendance control system that automated the calculation of schedules, attendance, and absences, improving administrative management by over 60%.
Applied the SCRUM methodology throughout the software development lifecycle, ensuring proper planning, control, and continuous improvement in projects.
Provided technical support for Internet, TV, and telephony services.
Developed assertive communication, empathy, and effective problem-solving skills under pressure.
Achieved high levels of customer satisfaction and consistently met performance metrics.

teamsImprove.title: Teams Improve
teamsImprove.shortDescription: Platform for team and user performance management and analysis
teamsImprove.details: A modern platform for managing, analyzing, and enhancing team and user performance with interactive dashboards and real-time metrics.

complianceAutomation.title: Compliance Automation Engine
complianceAutomation.shortDescription: Centralized automation platform for security and compliance
complianceAutomation.details: I participated in developing a centralized platform for the Security and Compliance department. The solution automated critical manual workflows, including policy exception reviews, access certification campaigns, and audit evidence collection. By digitizing and streamlining these processes, we slashed average review and approval cycle times by 40%, significantly reducing operational risk and ensuring a more agile and demonstrable compliance posture.

productModernization.title: Products Modernization
productModernization.shortDescription: Launching a New Design and Core Functionalities
productModernization.details: Contributed to the full redesign of the company’s web and mobile wallet, modernizing legacy code and applying best practices in React Native and React JS. These improvements and technical debt refactors significantly enhanced user experience, making the applications faster, smoother, more stable, and visually engaging, with fewer errors and a clearer, more intuitive navigation.

prepaidCard.title: Prepaid Cards Module
prepaidCard.shortDescription: Prepaid card self-management in mobile application
prepaidCard.details: Led the update, development and implementation of the Module Prepaid Card for self-service debit card management within the mobile application. This feature enabled users to instantly activate new cards and perform key operations such as temporary locks, unlocks, and status checks entirely through the app. By eliminating the need for customer service calls or branch visits, the module fully automated the management workflow, achieving a dramatic improvement in user experience and a significant reduction in operational costs.

map.title: Real-Time Tracked
map.shortDescription: Following in real-time the routes and deliveries of a logistics company
map.details: Spearheaded the development a logistics monitoring solution powered by the Google Maps API. The system enabled real-time tracking of delivery fleets, providing live updates on vehicle location, route progress, and delivery status. This end-to-end visibility facilitated dynamic route optimization, reduced travel times, and offered customers precise tracking, leading to a substantial improvement in shipment timeliness and overall operational efficiency.

frontend.javascript: The fundamental language of modern web development. Enables interactive experiences in the browser and connects logic with design.
frontend.typescript: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and advanced tooling. Improves scalability, readability and maintainability in large projects.
frontend.react1: A declarative library by Meta to build dynamic, reusable UIs for the web. Great for SPAs with high performance through an efficient Virtual DOM.
frontend.react2: A framework based on React JS to build native mobile apps with JavaScript and React. Compiles to native components for high performance and a near-native experience.
frontend.next: A React framework that enables SSR and SSG. Optimizes SEO and speeds up page loads.
frontend.html: Markup language that defines the base structure of any website. Foundation for content, accessibility and document semantics.

backend.nodejs: JavaScript runtime for the server side. Great for fast, scalable apps thanks to its asynchronous, event-driven model.
backend.c-sharp: Modern, strongly-typed OOP language by Microsoft. Ideal for enterprise apps, APIs and .NET development.
backend.python: Versatile, expressive language with simple syntax. Widely used in backend, data analysis, AI and automation.
backend.php: Mature, reliable language for dynamic web apps. Popular in LAMP stacks and CMSs such as WordPress or Laravel.

database.sqlServer: Robust Microsoft solution for database management. High performance, security and built-in analytics tools.
database.postgress: Advanced open-source relational database. Supports complex queries, transactional integrity and powerful extensions.
database.git: Distributed version control to manage code changes, collaborate and keep full development history.
database.vite: Ultra-fast dev tool replacing traditional bundlers. Instant HMR and efficient builds for modern frontend projects.
